definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: The success, is in each individual heart the loftiest dream.
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，无人不在时时刻刻做着成功的梦想。

sentences.english: Mixing charm with her trademark sarcasm, she is always full of surprises.
sentences.chinese: 她的讽刺焕发着独特的魅力，时时刻刻充满了惊喜。

sentences.english: I'm thinking of you every minute.
Because the mind, like the ocean waves, is constantly arising and ebbing.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们这念心时时刻刻在起波浪。

sentences.english: But he still looks at the boy every minute without eating and drinking.
sentences.chinese: 不过他仍然时时刻刻不吃不喝地盯着那个男子。

sentences.english: Developers must write programmer tests all the time.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员必须时时刻刻都要编写程序员测试。

sentences.english: The mystic clouds drift in and out, changing the scenery from minute to minute.
sentences.chinese: 神奇的云海漂进漂出，风景时时刻刻变幻莫测。

sentences.english: Thailand:Totally happy always in love and never dull.
sentences.chinese: 完全快乐时时刻刻蜜运中不会无聊。

sentences.english: That must always form the basis upon which we find common ground.
sentences.chinese: 这必须时时刻刻成为我们寻求共同之处的基础。
那是因为他们时时刻刻都在做生意。

sentences.english: A sunset like this shifted its tints every moment.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的日落时时刻刻在改变着色彩。

sentences.english: He is always in my thoughts.
Later, they decided to be sworn brothers and became more intimate than before .
sentences.chinese: 后来，两人结拜为兄弟，更是时时刻刻，形影不离。

sentences.english: I am thinking of you every minute and sharing your grief.
sentences.chinese: 我时时刻刻都在惦念你，并且分担你的悲伤。

definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
concentrating one's thoughts and efforts/single-minded/bent on/intently
wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
